title: FF! Doc | SizePipe
listItems: Required Support a current transaction; create a new one if none exists.
Supports Support a current transaction; execute non-transactionally if none exists.
Mandatory Support a current transaction; throw an exception if no current transaction exists.
RequiresNew Create a new transaction, suspending the current transaction if one exists.
NotSupported Do not support a current transaction; rather always execute non-transactionally.
Never Do not support a current transaction; throw an exception if a current transaction exists.

BytesOutputPipe
SizePipe
PipesTranslator
Returns the number of bytes or characters in the input.
See also
Github - SizePipe Implementation Examples
Javadoc - org.frankframework.pipes.SizePipe
Syntax
Copy
<SizePipe name=""/>
Attributes
Required
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
name	text	-
The functional name of this pipe. It can be referenced by the path attribute of a PipeForward.
Optional
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
directory	text	-
Directory to extract the archive to
directorySessionKey	text	-
Sessionkey with a directory value to extract the archive to
deleteOnExit	boolean	true
If true, file is automatically deleted upon normal JVM termination
collectResults	boolean	true
If false, only a small summary (count of items in zip) is returned
collectFileContents	boolean	false
If true, the contents of the files in the zip are returned in the result xml message of this
